org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical

Interface RegionContainer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Region
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvertRegion, ChartRegion, ChemRegion, CustomRegion, FrameRegion, GraphicRegion, ImageRegion, LineDrawingRegion, MapRegion, MathsRegion, MusicRegion, NoiseRegion, RegionImpl, SeparatorRegion, TableRegion, TextRegion

    public interface RegionContainer
    Interface for classes that are able to contain nested layout regions.
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRegion(Region region)
      Adds a nested region
      Region getRegion(int index)
      Returns a nested region
      int getRegionCount()
      Returns the number of regions that are nested within this object
      boolean hasRegions()
      Checks if this object contains nested regions
      void removeRegion(Region region)
      Removes a nested region

    • Method Detail

      • hasRegions

        boolean hasRegions()
        Checks if this object contains nested regions
        Returns:
        true if there are nested regions, false otherwise

        int getRegionCount()
        Returns the number of regions that are nested within this object
